attributes.action: National Register of All Insured Vehicles
attributes.additional_details:
To set up a National Register. Which would contain
The Person or Persons' entitled to drive.
Certificate Policy Number the first 10 Digits e.g GED/QMP/103  & Name of the Insurance Company e.g Quinn & Contact Details of Insurer.
The Registration Number of the Car.
So that if you had been hit by another Driver you could Check they are correct and you haven't been given false details. Most people could use their Mobile Phone Internet to check this at the accident.Insurance Companies could add these details so that they could be searched to see if the details are correct like you can check to see if your car is Insured on MID.
